about_the_game:
In this interactive storybook that feels straight out of the CD-Rom era, use both pointing AND clicking to guide Chet the Cheetah through his weight loss journey! Then guide him out of it in a thrilling escape from a body-shaming digital dystopia!

CONTAINS KINKY SITUATIONS,  (MILDLY) SPOOKY CONTENT AND RADICAL THEMES OF  BODY POSITIVITY SOME PLAYERS MAY FIND MORALLY FRIGHTENING AND CRINGE. NOT FOR CONSUMPTION BY CHILDREN NO MATTER HOW MUCH THEY LOVE 90s STORYBOOK CD-ROMS!

FEATURES

  • A short and sweet linear narrative you can play in one sitting.

  • Innovative point 'n' click linguistic puzzle solving that lets you literally rewrite Chet's story!

  • Beautiful cartoon animation in crisp 'n' cutting-edge (for 1996) 640x480px.

  • Full voice acting, with narration by Kingmaker Histories' Meg Molloy Tuten.

  • Twists!

  • Turns!

  • Tummies!

  • Tummies that get BIGGER!

  • Yay!!

content_descriptors.notes:
Mild kink-related content aimed at the adult furry community.
One character says the B-word one time! It's funny!

name: Cheetahs Are Meant To Be Fast

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista and later
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows Vista and later
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5

short_description: An interactive storybook about how being a fat guy who eats a lot is very morally wrong and not at all awesome or attractive.
